blog.name: madphantom
blog.title: Phangirl

summary: I can't stop laughing at the fact that the record press scene in PotP nearly went wrong and the thing that held back the press...
body:
I can’t stop laughing at the fact that the record press scene in PotP nearly went wrong and the thing that held back the press snapped. Like, imagine this conversation after that:

“Yeah, um, Bill, awesome acting, but we need another shot from this angle.”

“You want me to stick my head back into this thing?”

“Yyyes…?”

“After it nearly crushed me in in the last take?”

“…please?”

reblog.comment:

“…please?”

trail.content_raw:
I can’t stop laughing at the fact that the record press scene in PotP nearly went wrong and the thing that held back the press snapped. Like, imagine this conversation after that:

“Yeah, um, Bill, awesome acting, but we need another shot from this angle.”

“You want me to stick my head back into this thing?”

“Yyyes…?”

“After it nearly crushed me in in the last take?”

“…please?”
trail.content:
I can’t stop laughing at the fact that the record press scene in PotP nearly went wrong and the thing that held back the press snapped. Like, imagine this conversation after that:

“Yeah, um, Bill, awesome acting, but we need another shot from this angle.”

“You want me to stick my head back into this thing?”

“Yyyes…?”

“After it nearly crushed me in in the last take?”

“…please?”

blog.name: madphantom
blog.title: Phangirl

summary: Quick explanation beforehand: Synesthesia is the ability to associate sounds with colours. Since I have it, I decided to analyse...
body:
Synesthesia Analysis of the Phantom of Paradise soundtrack

Quick explanation beforehand: Synesthesia is the ability to associate sounds with colours. Since I have it, I decided to analyse the PotP soundtrack and write down the colours the songs have for me:

Goodbye, Eddie, Goodbye:

Faust (Winslow’s Version):

Upholstery:

Special to Me:

Phantom’s Theme:

Somebody super like you:

Life at Last:

Old Souls:

Faust (Swan):

The Hell of it:

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

summary: Cozy Fics To Read Before Sleep (2) Masterlist
title: Cozy Fics To Read Before Sleep (2) Masterlist
body:
part one

Changes (Turn And Face The Strange) (ao3) - happy_hufflepuffle

Summary: Kath likes to think she doesn’t miss things when it comes to her family. But maybe this time she did.

Contentment (ao3) - badbadnotgood

Summary: “Dan,” Phil pipes up, “You know how Planet Earth screenings need absolute silence for the ambient sound and suspense?”

Daniel’s Spaniels (ao3) - bathildabagshott

Summary: Dan owns a dog rescue. Phil volunteers to help.

Dimples And Crinkles (ao3) - waveydnp

Summary: In honour of dnp’s 8th friendiversary, here’s my shamelessly soft, fluffy version of their first kiss.

Dip and Pip Domestic Fluff (ao3) - itsmyusualphannie (itsmyusualday)

Summary: why do homework when you can write about two idiots being in love?

Fall…The Colors Leave Me Breathless (ao3) - glitterhowell

Summary: It’s their seven-year anniversary and pastel Dan is nervous about letting his punk boyfriend Phil plan their anniversary date. But when Phil is able to surprise his boyfriend with the perfect date Dan didn’t think it could get any better. There’s no way this day could be more perfect, could it?

Got Good Taste In You - heartfeltfangirl

Summary: A story about Phil cooking and contemplating past Valentine’s Days, Dan being soft in a liveshow, and slowly inching out of the closet.

Hug My Body, Babe (ao3) - deathlytireddan

Summary: “You’re saying that an awful lot tonight,” he teases, “what did I do to deserve your hate?”

“So much.” Phil is not telling him. Not because he doesn’t want to, but because he knows, absolutely knows, that Dan will cry his eyes out if Phil says what is on his mind.

In My Arms - phantasticlizzy

Summary: ‘“Why did you get up so early?” Dan asks, and he knows that his voice sounds a little accusing but he’s still tired and he’s still worried and saying “please don’t ever go anywhere when I’m not right there to follow you,” seems a little too much as a response to a morning shower.’

Love You In The In Betweens (ao3) - commonemergency

Summary: The space between Christmas and New Years is like a black hole sometimes, but he’s fighting his way out of it. Or Dan hasn’t tweeted because this is his hibernating time before New Year’s Eve.

Maybe Next Year (ao3) -TwistedRocketPower

Summary:  The honeymoon phase has to end eventually… Right?

Real Hugs Are Coming - secretlywritingstories

Summary: Dan confessed to his online friend that he was really craving a hug but he most certainly didn’t expect to find a kind and handsome stranger suddenly standing outside of his door.

So Tell Me When You’re Going To Let Me In - definitelythor

Summary: After Dan’s kicked out of his family home at Christmas, he picks up a hitchhiker on the way to York, and at first he wonders if he’s made a huge mistake. But Phil’s actually kind of perfect, and maybe fate does exist after all.

Speeding Through Red Lights Into Paradise (ao3) - dizzy

Summary: Ian can’t come on Phil’s family trip to Florida with him, so of course Phil invites the guy he’s hardly even talked to instead.

That’s How Easy Love Can Be - phloridas

Summary: An alphabetical journey of Phil’s 26 favourite things about Dan–along with a special surprise at the end–may just make Dan’s 26th birthday his best one yet.

The Sun A Souvenir (ao3) - deletable_bird

Summary: It took Dan a record-breaking eleven times of being in the same physical space as his current crush before he managed to speak a word to him.

Where The Trees We Planted Grow - alittledizzy

Summary: Dan and Phil take a trip to Japan after the tour is over.

Wish You Were Here (ao3) - knlalla

Summary: Dan’s back home after visiting Phil & he’s sad.

reblog.comment:

Summary: In honour of dnp’s 8th friendiversary, here’s my shamelessly soft, fluffy version of their first kiss.

Dip and Pip Domestic Fluff (ao3) - itsmyusualphannie (itsmyusualday)

Summary: why do homework when you can write about two idiots being in love?

Fall…The Colors Leave Me Breathless (ao3) - glitterhowell

Summary: It’s their seven-year anniversary and pastel Dan is nervous about letting his punk boyfriend Phil plan their anniversary date. But when Phil is able to surprise his boyfriend with the perfect date Dan didn’t think it could get any better. There’s no way this day could be more perfect, could it?

Got Good Taste In You - heartfeltfangirl

Summary: A story about Phil cooking and contemplating past Valentine’s Days, Dan being soft in a liveshow, and slowly inching out of the closet.

Hug My Body, Babe (ao3) - deathlytireddan

Summary: “You’re saying that an awful lot tonight,” he teases, “what did I do to deserve your hate?”

“So much.” Phil is not telling him. Not because he doesn’t want to, but because he knows, absolutely knows, that Dan will cry his eyes out if Phil says what is on his mind.

In My Arms - phantasticlizzy

Summary: ‘“Why did you get up so early?” Dan asks, and he knows that his voice sounds a little accusing but he’s still tired and he’s still worried and saying “please don’t ever go anywhere when I’m not right there to follow you,” seems a little too much as a response to a morning shower.’

Love You In The In Betweens (ao3) - commonemergency

Summary: The space between Christmas and New Years is like a black hole sometimes, but he’s fighting his way out of it. Or Dan hasn’t tweeted because this is his hibernating time before New Year’s Eve.

Maybe Next Year (ao3) -TwistedRocketPower

Summary:  The honeymoon phase has to end eventually… Right?

Real Hugs Are Coming - secretlywritingstories

Summary: Dan confessed to his online friend that he was really craving a hug but he most certainly didn’t expect to find a kind and handsome stranger suddenly standing outside of his door.

So Tell Me When You’re Going To Let Me In - definitelythor

Summary: After Dan’s kicked out of his family home at Christmas, he picks up a hitchhiker on the way to York, and at first he wonders if he’s made a huge mistake. But Phil’s actually kind of perfect, and maybe fate does exist after all.

Speeding Through Red Lights Into Paradise (ao3) - dizzy

Summary: Ian can’t come on Phil’s family trip to Florida with him, so of course Phil invites the guy he’s hardly even talked to instead.

That’s How Easy Love Can Be - phloridas

Summary: An alphabetical journey of Phil’s 26 favourite things about Dan–along with a special surprise at the end–may just make Dan’s 26th birthday his best one yet.

The Sun A Souvenir (ao3) - deletable_bird

Summary: It took Dan a record-breaking eleven times of being in the same physical space as his current crush before he managed to speak a word to him.

Where The Trees We Planted Grow - alittledizzy

Summary: Dan and Phil take a trip to Japan after the tour is over.

Wish You Were Here (ao3) - knlalla

Summary: Dan’s back home after visiting Phil & he’s sad.

blog.name: ahappydnp
blog.description: keelin. 26. she/her. will rant about the things i love until you're sick of me. ao3

tags: i was still in the phan closet when it came out
and was too ashamed to buy it
